description: Explore the Arbitrum airdrop, a pivotal moment in blockchain technology and decentralized governance. Understand how Arbitrum, a Layer 2 Ethereum scaling solution, utilized strategic token distribution to engage the community and enhance its governance model.
keywords: Arbitrum, airdrop, blockchain, decentralized governance, Layer 2 solutions, Offchain Labs, Ethereum, Rollups, token distribution, community engagement
title: The Arbitrum Airdrop: Pioneering the Path of Decentralized Governance
